item.title: 100 errors. Cannot figure out. Master coder needed

@ion5005 wrote:

I figured it out. While I was entering the Trade restriction i messed something up.

item.source: 100 errors. Cannot figure out. Master coder needed

item.title: 100 errors. Cannot figure out. Master coder needed
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

You probably decompiled a client that was closed source, and they perhaps put bugs in it, without compiling before they sent it out.

My suggestion is to get an open source client.

Read full topic
item.source: 100 errors. Cannot figure out. Master coder needed
